title: Home
body: JOIN THE PACK!Start exploring and discover why CSUSB is the best choice for your higher education. 81%FIRST-GENERATION COLLEGE STUDENTS78%STUDENTS RECEIVE GRANTS AND SCHOLARSHIPS1,700+ON-CAMPUS STUDENT EMPLOYEESRanked as one of the top 50 most transformative colleges in the nation– Money magazine (December 2019)The Veterans Success Center at CSUSB has been recognized as a Top Veteran Friendly school for eight years in a row, since 2013.– U.S. Veterans Magazine (USVM)Ranked #13 in Social Mobility in the West– U.S. News & World Report (2022 rankings)EXPLORE CSUSB
